text: “(tavada) oba mā haṭa aṇa kaḷa andamaṭama mā (ovunṭa) “oba, maṭada obaṭada deviyan vana allāhvama namadinu” yayi pævasuvā misa, mā vena kisivak (kisi viṭekat) pævasuvē næta. mā ovun samaga siṭina tāk kal ovungē væḍa kaṭayutu balā siṭiyemi. oba māva atpat kaḷa pasu, obama ovunva avadhānaya karanneku vaśayen siṭi atara siyallaṭa obama sākṣi darannehiya”
